import React from "react" import Card from "../components/card" import FormGroup from "../components/form-group" class CadastroUsuario extends React.Component{ state = { nome : '', email : '', senha : '', senhaReticao : '' } cadastrar = () => { console.log(this.state) } render(){ return (
this.setState({nome: e.target.value}) } /> this.setState({email: e.target.value}) } /> this.setState({senha: e.target.value}) } /> this.setState({senhaReticao: e.target.value}) } />
) } } export default CadastroUsuario
